com.opengamma.strata.pricer.fx

Interface BlackVolatilityFxProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlackVolatilityFlatFxProvider, BlackVolatilitySurfaceFxProvider

    public interface BlackVolatilityFxProvider
    Data provider of volatility for FX options in the lognormal or Black-Scholes model.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CurrencyPair getCurrencyPair()
      Gets the currency pair of the provider.
      ZonedDateTime getValuationDateTime()
      Gets the valuation date-time.
      double relativeTime(ZonedDateTime zonedDateTime)
      Converts a date to a relative double time.
      CurrencyParameterSensitivity surfaceParameterSensitivity(FxOptionSensitivity point)
      Computes the sensitivity to the nodes used in the description of the Black volatility from a point sensitivity.
      default CurrencyParameterSensitivities surfaceParameterSensitivity(PointSensitivities sensitivities)
      Calculates the surface parameter sensitivities from the point sensitivities.
      double volatility(CurrencyPair currencyPair, double expiryTime, double strike, double forward)
      Calculates the Black volatility.
      default double volatility(CurrencyPair currencyPair, ZonedDateTime expiryDateTime, double strike, double forward)
      Calculates the Black volatility.

    • Method Detail

      • getValuationDateTime

        ZonedDateTime getValuationDateTime()
        Gets the valuation date-time.

        The data in this provider is calibrated for this date-time.

        Returns:
        the valuation date-time

      • getCurrencyPair

        CurrencyPair getCurrencyPair()
        Gets the currency pair of the provider.

        The data in this provider is calibrated for this currency pair.

        Returns:
        the currency pair

      • relativeTime

        double relativeTime(ZonedDateTime zonedDateTime)
        Converts a date to a relative double time.
        Parameters:
        zonedDateTime - the zoned date time
        Returns:
        the relative time

      • volatility

        default double volatility(CurrencyPair currencyPair,
                          ZonedDateTime expiryDateTime,
                          double strike,
                          double forward)
        Calculates the Black volatility.
        Parameters:
        currencyPair - the currency pair
        expiryDateTime - the option expiry
        strike - the option strike
        forward - the underling forward
        Returns:
        the volatility

      • volatility

        double volatility(CurrencyPair currencyPair,
                  double expiryTime,
                  double strike,
                  double forward)
        Calculates the Black volatility.
        Parameters:
        currencyPair - the currency pair
        expiryTime - the option expiry
        strike - the option strike
        forward - the underling forward
        Returns:
        the volatility

      • surfaceParameterSensitivity

        CurrencyParameterSensitivity surfaceParameterSensitivity(FxOptionSensitivity point)
        Computes the sensitivity to the nodes used in the description of the Black volatility from a point sensitivity.
        Parameters:
        point - the point sensitivity at a given key
        Returns:
        the sensitivity to the nodes

      • surfaceParameterSensitivity

        default CurrencyParameterSensitivities surfaceParameterSensitivity(PointSensitivities sensitivities)
        Calculates the surface parameter sensitivities from the point sensitivities.
        Parameters:
        sensitivities - the point sensitivities
        Returns:
        the parameter sensitivity
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the result cannot be calculated
